Background and Education

I'm a senior, pursuing my Bachelor of Technology in Information Technology at NITK, Surathkal. My interests and a majority of my projects are on Full-Stack Development and Web Security. Although, I do dabble with Computer Vision and Maching Learning occasionally. I also enjoy business research and am currently doing a study on Online Shopping Cart Abandonment.

I just completed my internship at Wells Fargo and would love to hone my skills in a new internship/part-time opportunity! I've previously worked at the Idea to Startup Lab at Indian School of Business as a Research Intern, and worked in two more startups RoaDo and FluxGen Enineering Technologies.

When I'm not in class or working, I'm probably dancing, writing, or rewatching my all time favourite cartoons.

Currently seeking fall 2021 internships/ 2022 full time opportunities!
